Brent Crivens was one of the inhabitants of Reithwin, the town that once venerated Sel√ªne in the Western Heartlands, sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Brent Crivens perished in a tragic event sometime before the fall of Reithwin, before the , and before it was consumed by the Shadow-cursed Lands. The event took the lives of Brent and almost every member of the Crivens clan, including the family dog, outlived only by Errick Crivens, who was, in some way, the cause of the tragedy. Brent Crivens was buried in Reithwins graveyard behind the House of Healing in a cluster surrounded by the graves of his family. His tombstone read "In Memory of Brent Crivens, taken along with his family on the same grim night. May their deaths be avenged." The Crivens familys grave markers remained relatively undamaged and legible as of the .
